content: ****this pattern can be found for free supported by ads on my blog **** you may also choose to purchase the advertisement free printable pdf copy here on ravelry thank you **edits have been made regarding pattern clarifications brought up in some past reviews and comments thank you this useful and trendy bag is made with chunky yarn and a large crochet hook bag does utilize a center single_crochet stitch and there is a video tutorial link to show you how it is done a fun and useful project
